item.title: UnConditional Love in a Couples Relationship
item.description: It is commonly said that Women are complex in mental nature while Men remain easy to understand and simple. Whatever be the reasons that backup this comment, in relationships both Men and Women follow slightly diverted paths. What Men look for in a relationship is not what motivates Women to fall in relationships. The differences in desires, mentalities, passion, expression levels etc.,
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Courtship time, Make it memorable, ways to add some spice
item.description: Finally you found a guy or girl with whom you can't wait to start most excitement time of your life. But you see lot of time for wedding and So you got lot of time to know each other even more better. The Best you can do is make this time memorable. 1.
